name: plan
title: Plan
author: SikandarJODD
description: The Plan component provides a collapsible container for displaying AI-generated plans with structured sections including header, title, description, actions, content, and footer.

files.content:
<script lang="ts">
	import { Collapsible } from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/collapsible/index.js";
	import { Card } from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/card/index.js";
	import { cn } from "$UTILS$";
	import { setPlanContext } from "./plan-context.svelte.js";
	import type { PlanProps } from "./types.js";

	let { class: className, isStreaming = false, children, ...restProps }: PlanProps = $props();

	// Set context for child components
	setPlanContext({ isStreaming });
</script>

<Collapsible data-slot="plan" {...restProps}>
	<Card class={cn("shadow-none", className)}>
		{@render children?.()}
	</Card>
</Collapsible>

<script lang="ts">
	import { CardAction } from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/card/index.js";
	import type { PlanActionProps } from "./types.js";

	let { children, ...restProps }: PlanActionProps = $props();
</script>

<CardAction data-slot="plan-action" {...restProps}>
	{@render children?.()}
</CardAction>

<script lang="ts">
	import { CollapsibleContent } from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/collapsible/index.js";
	import { CardContent } from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/card/index.js";
	import type { PlanContentProps } from "./types.js";

	let { children, ...restProps }: PlanContentProps = $props();
</script>

<CollapsibleContent>
	<CardContent data-slot="plan-content" {...restProps}>
		{@render children?.()}
	</CardContent>
</CollapsibleContent>

<script lang="ts">
	import { CardDescription } from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/card/index.js";
	import { Shimmer } from "$COMPONENTS$/ai-elements/shimmer/index.js";
	import { cn } from "$UTILS$";
	import { getPlanContext } from "./plan-context.svelte.js";
	import type { PlanDescriptionProps } from "./types.js";

	let { class: className, children, ...restProps }: PlanDescriptionProps = $props();

	const { isStreaming } = getPlanContext();
</script>

<CardDescription class={cn("text-balance", className)} data-slot="plan-description" {...restProps}>
	{#if isStreaming}
		<Shimmer content_length={80}>
			{#snippet children()}
				{@render children()}
			{/snippet}
		</Shimmer>
	{:else}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</CardDescription>

<script lang="ts">
	import { CardFooter } from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/card/index.js";
	import type { PlanFooterProps } from "./types.js";

	let { children, ...restProps }: PlanFooterProps = $props();
</script>

<CardFooter data-slot="plan-footer" {...restProps}>
	{@render children?.()}
</CardFooter>

<script lang="ts">
	import { CardHeader } from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/card/index.js";
	import { cn } from "$UTILS$";
	import type { PlanHeaderProps } from "./types.js";

	let { class: className, children, ...restProps }: PlanHeaderProps = $props();
</script>

<CardHeader
	class={cn("flex items-start justify-between", className)}
	data-slot="plan-header"
	{...restProps}
>
	{@render children?.()}
</CardHeader>

<script lang="ts">
	import { CardTitle } from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/card/index.js";
	import { Shimmer } from "$COMPONENTS$/ai-elements/shimmer/index.js";
	import { getPlanContext } from "./plan-context.svelte.js";
	import type { PlanTitleProps } from "./types.js";

	let { children, ...restProps }: PlanTitleProps = $props();

	const { isStreaming } = getPlanContext();
</script>

<CardTitle data-slot="plan-title" {...restProps}>
	{#if isStreaming}
		<Shimmer content_length={50}>
			{#snippet children()}
				{@render children()}
			{/snippet}
		</Shimmer>
	{:else}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</CardTitle>
